params._communityId: Community identifier for this claims contract instance
params._membershipToken: MembershipToken contract address for minting rewards

params.claimId: Claim ID to get info for

returns._0: Array of claim IDs for worker

updateContracts(address,address).details: actionRegistry and communityId are immutable and cannot be updated

params.approve: True to approve, false to reject

assignJurors(uint256,address[]).notice: Assign jurors to a claim (called by VerifierManager)

getClaimJurors(uint256).notice: Get jurors assigned to a claim

getCommunityId().notice: Get the community ID for this claims contract

getPendingClaims(uint256).notice: Get pending claims for action type

hasJurorVoted(uint256,address).notice: Check if juror has voted on claim

revoke(uint256).notice: Revoke claim (governance only, for revocable action types)

submit(uint256,string).notice: Submit a work claim for verification

verify(uint256,bool).notice: Submit verification vote as assigned juror
